EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2021-11-18-HHS-TDH-Inpatient-Solution-Webinar.post-event-did-not-attend
EmailTemplate.subject: We missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: SORRY YOU MISSED IT: Access the recording below We are sorry you could not make it to our recent webinar. Access the event recording below to hear Jennifer Ball, Director of Virtual Care at Saint Luke’s Health System, and Tammy Cress, Director of Inpatient Care Solutions at Teladoc Health, discuss the value of redesigning inpatient care delivery to integrate virtual care. Jennifer also talks about the advantages Saint Luke’s achieved by creating one of the nation’s first virtual nursing programs. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
